description: Try our easy to follow Japanese Sake & Ginger Glazed Salmon Cutlets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Japanese Sake & Ginger Glazed Salmon Cutlets Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 cm piece fresh ginger, peeled, finely grated
3 green shallots, ends trimmed, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sake, shallots, ginger, soy sauce and sugar in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Place salmon cutlets into a shallow ceramic dish. Pour over sake mixture. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.
Heat a BBQ plate or chargrill over high heat. Cook salmon cutlets for 2 minutes each side or until cooked to your liking. Transfer to a plate and cover with foil to keep warm. Repeat.
Meanwhile, cook noodles following packet instructions. Divide noodles evenly among serving plates. Top with salmon and sprinkle with ginger and shallots to serve.
